channel.title: Npc help
channel.description: Ok I finaly got a server running and I was wondering what file you open to change what a npc says(above head) Thanks.

item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

in npchandler.java search for “moo” (no quotes)

you will see something like this

						if (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) {
						if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";
						}
						}

just copy that and add a new one, replace the

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) {

part with the npc’s ID and replace the

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";

part with the text

Read full topic
